Description: FULLY renovated unit. This 3-bedroom, PLUS an office, is complete with high efficiency stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, in unit washer dryer, hardwood floors throughout and a gorgeous master bedroom suite. The unit has the open concept everyone desires as well as central A/C, and is fully insulated for more efficient energy use. Quiet and private front deck. Conveniently located just minutes from BMC, Longwood Medical Area, Harvard School of Public Health, Tufts Medical Center, Nubian Station (Dudley Square), and the "T" Station.
